content: Analyze current payroll function to identify all data sources and calculation logic
Create simple SQL queries for raw data extraction (employees, attendance, configs, etc.)
Create AttendanceCalculator.js with exact SQL logic replication
Create PenaltyCalculator.js replicating penalty calculation logic
Create OvertimeCalculator.js with overtime calculation methods
Create SalaryCalculator.js for gross wage and deduction calculations
Create payrollOptimized() method using Promise.all and calculation modules
Test new method against existing method to ensure identical responses
Compare performance and MySQL load between old and new methods
